pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Frinx Python SDKThis package contains implementation of [Workflow Manager](https://docs.frinx.io/frinx-workflow-manager/introduction/)client, building blocks for task and workflow definitions and ready-to-use implementations of tasks and workflows,which cover basic use cases of [FRINX MACHINE](https://docs.frinx.io/) components.## Environment set up1. Install poetry ```sh sudo apt-get -y install pipx pipx install poetry ```2. Install dependencies ```sh poetry install ```## How to contribute1. Create new feature branch. ```sh git checkout -b <branch_name> ```2. Add your changes. ```sh git add <file> ```3. OPTIONAL - Run pre-commit. Pre-commit triggers linting and static type checker hooks. These checks are also triggered by GitHub actions when a PR is created or updated. All errors and warnings raised by linters and type checkers must be fixed before the PR can be merged. ```sh poetry shell pre-commit ```4. Commit your changes. We do not enforce commit message structure, but you should follow these [best practices](https://cbea.ms/git-commit/). ```sh git commit ```5. Push your branch to remote repository. ```sh git push -u origin <branch_name> ```
